overview: From Vimeo: "This is my short documentary, 27 minutes with Mr. Noisy- a documentary about my father, Bruce Russell. Bruce talks about his work with The Dead C, other projects, and life in the Dunedin scene. I made it for school, and did all the shooting myself; except for the live music shots, which I give credit to whoever owns them. I know its long, but I would really love to hear what you think :)"
title: 27 Minutes with Mr. Noisy
